title: COMMISSION REGULATION (EEC) No 1402/93 of 8 June 1993 amending Regulation (EEC) No 2561/90 laying down provisions for the implementation of Council Regulation (EEC) No 2503/88 on customs warehouses
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EEC) No 1402/93 of 8 June 1993 amending Regulation (EEC) No 2561/90 laying down provisions for the implementation of Council Regulation (EEC) No 2503/88 on customs warehouses
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN  COMMUNITIES
main_body:
The following clause is hereby deleted from the second subparagraph of Article 61 (3) of Regulation (EEC) No 2561/90:
', including the export licence or advance fixing certificate referred to in Regulation (EEC) No 3719/88'.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the third day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 8 June 1993.
For the Commission
Christiane SCRIVENER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 225, 15. 8. 1988, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 246, 10. 9. 1990, p. 1.
(3) OJ No L 98, 24. 4. 1993, p. 24.
(4) OJ No L 331, 2. 12. 1988, p. 1.
(5) OJ No L 210, 25. 7. 1992, p. 18.
(6) OJ No L 62, 7. 3. 1980, p. 5.
(7) OJ No L 199, 22. 7. 1983, p. 12.
